name: SPIDERS-V2.5
description:
This is a game made by me, a 13 year old, where you are chased by giant spiders. it was fun to make and fun to publish. have fun!

COMING SOON: In game money and skins

-note: no adds. ADDS FRIGGIN' SUCK, man!

-controls if you aren't a pro gamer like ME (Also me: only knows the controls bc i literally made it) movement is W A S D or arrow keys, press escape to pause.
